about.body:
This OpenID Connect service is built from the MITREid Connect Open Source project, from The MITRE Corporation and the MIT Kerberos and Internet Trust Consortium.

W.I.S.V. ''Christiaan Huygens'' has its own custom version on top of the stock MITREid Connect implementation. More information about the project can be found at CH Connect on GitHub. There, you can submit bug reports, give feedback, or even contribute code patches for additional features you''d like to see.

contact.body: To report bugs with the CH Connect software itself, use the GitHub issue tracker. For problems relating to this server, contact CH Beheer.

copyright: Powered by CH Connect © 2021 W.I.S.V. ''Christiaan Huygens''

about.body: This OpenID Connect service is built from the MITREid Connect Open Source project, and is customised by W.I.S.V. ''Christiaan Huygens''.

contact.body:
CH Connect is provided as a service for members of W.I.S.V. ''Christiaan Huygens''.
